Row.Text: This situation is going to get worse before it gets any better.
I have done nothing wrong, and the people of Kongo do not deserve your slander.
The glory and might of France will not be tarnished by such obvious lies.
You dare insult the New Isis?!? You will regret this!
I should answer you with my sword… perhaps I will.
Your lies will not be believed by the wise, and the foolish will learn their lesson.
Hah! Gilgamesh is stronger than your false words.
Your words are meaningless compared to our deeds.
Hah, I’ve burned kingdoms for lesser insults. You’ll pay for this.
Empty words are no threat. Show me action, purpose, discipline!
This situation is going to get worse before it gets any better.
All leaders incur hatred and unpopularity; if one has a great aim to pursue, this burden of envy must be accepted.
My people live through winters more dangerous than your army. Do you think we’re afraid of your threats?
There is no greater sin than to defy the anointed servant of the Lord. You will pay dearly for this.
So, an insect dares to offend a dragon. That was not wise.
Everyone is critical of the flaws of others, but blind to their own.
How dare you!
No one will believe your hollow lies. Tomyris is a good friend to the worthy.
So, it is true: one who is full of envy, disparages everything, good or bad.
The Queen wishes to warn those who disrespect her people and her mandate of the manifold troubles that will ensue.
The world needs to be aware of your transgressions (Denounces You).
You are an evil upon this world. Your name will be cursed for ages. (Denounces You)
I don't like the look of what you've been up to. What would your friends think of this information? (Denounces You).
You are worse than Brutus and Cassius combined. The world will know the truth! (Denounces You)
The world will know of your treachery. And you will be judged. (Denounces You)
You are untrustworthy; this is the worst kind of violence. (Denounces You).
Let the world hear my words: you are as treacherous as Ishtar.(Denounces You)
You are worse than sophists. Let the rest of the world know. (Denounces You)
There will be no place for you at Odin’s table. You are a disgrace.(Denounces You).
You are a foolish, simple leader. And your people should know the truth. (Denounces You).
The world needs to be aware of your transgressions (Denounces You).
Tyrants such as you are abominations. Your people will know the truth of my words. (Denounces You)
I have seen much in my life, but I have never seen such a despicable leader. You should be ashamed, and will be. (Denounces You).
You are another Judas, come to betray the Lord. (Denounces You).
Your reputation is forever tarnished. (Denounces You)
It is said by my people that the house of a tyrant is a ruin… and all I see is ruin around you. (Denounces You)
I cannot abide a ruler without dignity, and the world must be made aware. (Denounces You)
You are a wretched liar and cannot be trusted! You are the worst of your kind. (Denounces You)
The more corrupt the state, the more numerous the laws. And look how many you have! (Denounces You)
We will have nothing to do with your administration. You are hereby denounced. (Denounces You)
